name: Plaza Athenee Bangkok, A Royal Meridien Hotel

reviews.text: Was here a week ago for business trip of 5 days and has stayed at the Le Meridien Plaza Athenee Bangkok. Excellent location at the business / diplomatic district at the heart of Bangkok and only 5 minutes by walking from the BTS Ploenchit Station and 2 stops away from the shopping district like Paragon / MBK / Central World, you name it!
reviews.title: Lost in Bangkok!

reviews.text: The room was great, dominated more by its old and classic look...excellent bathroom. Got a complimentary to enjoy the club lounge and free laundry for 2 pcs per stay.
reviews.title: Could have been better with their rates

reviews.text: Breakfast was excellent, quite range of choices.
reviews.title: Average hotel

reviews.text: However, during our last stay, there was a bit of incident, when we checked out (it was early in the morning) we called the bell boy to take the luggage and by the time we arrived at the airport, we missed one luggage. Luckily there has been more time to get it and so my husband has to go back all the way to the hotel. We really regret this thing to happen especially on our check out day, why there was NO communication between the reception and the bell boy knowing that we were checking out at that time. We had to pay on our own taxi expenses as the hotel did not want to responsible with it.
reviews.title: Top notch SPG hotel, great staff, good restaurants. Good value

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Other than that everything is great and will we ever go back, the answer is yes we might.
reviews.title: Bangkok Oasis

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A great week in a great hotel. In spite of limitations due to floodings, the central area is fully accessable and the Plaza Athena is a real gem. Sitting almost on Sukhumvit road, right in the bustling center, this hotel offers you the perfect basis for an enjoyable stay in Bangkok. Beautifull hotel, excellent and friendly staff, large rooms, nice pool area, good spa, you name it. To be recommended.
reviews.title: Dazzling Bangkok

reviews.text: From start to finish I had a great experience at the hotel. I arrived to the city late at night and the hotel's car service was waiting to pick me up at the airport. When we got to the hotel, a manager and bellman were waiting at the door for my arrival--they had already checked me in, upgraded my room, and helped carry my bags up. The room was a massive suite with an extremely comfortable bed, very little noise, and an amazing view--a great place to rest and work throughout my business trip. Room service was consistently good and the staff was friendly and helpful. The one small glitch was a power outage that shut down the elevators for a while. I came back to my room to find chocolates and a letter apologizing for the inconvenience, which was totally unnecessary but a very nice surprise.
reviews.title: Above and beyond

reviews.text: Plaza Athenee is our preferred place to stay in Bangkok for many years now for its location, service and value. The spa is as good as it gets and the pool service is impeccable.
reviews.title: Aways glad to come back year after year

reviews.text: Their airport pick up and drop off service will whisk you trough customs and first class check-in in no time. Always professional and always with a great smile. Plaza Athenee's breakfast is legendary with specialties from around the world. Plan at least one hour to enjoy.
reviews.title: Great hotel!

reviews.text: Their Thai restaurant has a new chef assuring the best Thai cooking has to offer, don't miss it.
reviews.title: lovely
VERY highly recommended
reviews.text: Recently had a great stay here - everything was great. Staff was superb, room was luxury and clean (ok its not a brand new trendy modern hotel like so many in Bangkok but this hotel has established style & character), breakfast was best I have seen from many hotels in Bangkok in terms of choice and, importantly, quality!

This hotel is well located for most of Bangkok's attractions.
reviews.title: Perfect 10

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Just finished a 3 night stay at Plaza Athenee Hotel and it was fantastic from the moment we checked in to the morning we checked out on January 1st . We booked a club room and were on the 26th floor adjacent to the club which is very comfortable , not pretentious like some club rooms can be . You never felt underdressed or overdressed which was nice . You had the choice of having breakfast at the club which had limited choices or the breakfast buffet at the Rain Tree Cafe on the ground floor which was fantastic with many choices for anyone from Thai cuisine , to sushi , Chinese dim som to western style omelets !! The whole hotel was decorated for Christmas and was beautiful ! A very easy 5 minute walk to the BTS station and from there you can get mostly anywhere in the city . Siam station is just 2 stations away . You could even connect to the Airport Link train as well if you wanted to save some time and a little money during rush hour peak times by cab . Also not be hassled by a Bangkok cab driver is a plus by avoiding them !
reviews.title: Lovely place to stay

description: The hotel is situated on the most beautiful tree-lined avenue in the heart of Bangkok and just a five minutes walk to the Ploenchit Skytrain station connected to the city’s largest shopping centre of Siam Paragon and Central World (two stops away) as well as the tourist attractions, including Chao Phraya River and Chatuchak Weekend Market. The famous Thai Boxing Stadium at Lumpini Park and Central Chidlom Shopping Centre are within easy walking distance.All guestrooms and luxurious suites boast views over the ever-changing Bangkok skyline. The hotel’s myriad facilities include a sublime spa, roof-top tropical pool, squash court, roof top jogging track, fitness centre and 8 creative restaurants and bars.
